description: This header file defines mock classes for the ILifecycleManager and ILifecycleManagerState interfaces used in testing. It includes mock methods for lifecycle management operations such as registering notifications, loading apps, changing app states, and sending intents.

classes.name: LifecycleManagerMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing ILifecycleManager interface for testing lifecycle management functionalities.

classes.name: LifecycleManagerNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing ILifecycleManager::INotification interface for testing notification mechanisms.

classes.name: LifecycleManagerStateMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing ILifecycleManagerState interface for testing lifecycle state transitions.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of notifications or state change listeners.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of notifications or state change listeners.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of loaded applications list.

methods.name: IsAppLoaded
methods.description: Mocks check whether an application is loaded.

methods.name: SetTargetAppState
methods.description: Mocks setting the desired state for an application.

methods.name: SendIntentToActiveApp
methods.description: Mocks sending an intent to the currently active application.

methods.name: AppReady
methods.description: Mocks notification that an application is ready.

methods.name: StateChangeComplete
methods.description: Mocks notification that an application's state change has completed.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Mocks closing an application with a specified reason.
